game.name: BONEMARROW
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: BoneMarrow is a short action survival horror in which you play a mutant creature created in a lab, destined to be used as a test subject. When the facility you were created in falls into disarray due to the meddling of a dark cult, you finally have your opportunity to escape.
game.shortDescriptionEn: BoneMarrow is a short action survival horror in which you play a mutant creature created in a lab, destined to be used as a test subject. When the facility you were created in falls into disarray due to the meddling of a dark cult, you finally have your opportunity to escape.
